    <item> 
      <title>US commander demoted over Iran incident</title>  
      <description>The US Navy demotes the commander of the 10 US sailors who in January entered Iranian territorial waters and were briefly detained.</description>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Trump's ex-butler urges Obama's death</title>  
      <description>The US Secret Service has launched an investigation after Donald Trump's former butler called for death of President Barack Obama.</description>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Drop airline bag fees, US senators say</title>  
      <description>Two US senators urge airlines to temporarily stop charging passengers baggage fees in an effort to speed up security queues.</description>

    </item>  
    <item> 
      <title>Zimmerman handgun returns to auction</title>  
      <description>The pistol used to kill unarmed black teenager Trayvon Martin will be auctioned online following the refusal of another website to allow the sale.</description>

      <title>Invictus swimmer gives medal to medics</title>  
      <description>An American soldier gives her Invictus Games gold medal to the hospital that saved her life.</description>

      <title>US Congress 'bans members' Yahoo Mail'</title>  
      <description>A series of ransomware attacks on the House of Representatives leads US Congress to ban members from using Yahoo Mail, according to a leaked email.</description>

      <title>Blogger reveals parking ticket errors</title>  
      <description>A blogger in New York uses public data to prove that the New York Police Department ticketed thousands of cars that were actually parked legally.</description>

      <title>US activates missile shield in Romania</title>

      <title>Trump softens stance on Muslim ban</title>
